fresh.body:
I’m currently working with a client who is researching {{goal}}. I came across your profile and thought you’d be a great fit for a 30-60 minute call with my client to discuss this topic.

The company I work for, Tegus by AlphaSense, is a leading expert network and research platform.

We’re happy to compensate you at a rate that would make the call worth your time.

Do you have some time to connect? Feel free to check my availability on my calendar, or I can send further information via email.

be_prior.body:
Hi Ben,

Thank you for being a part of the Tegus by AlphaSense expert network!

My name is Ben, {{goal}} To get started, I just need your answers to these research questions:

  • Are you a customer of Twilio?
  • When did you last evaluate competitor solutions?
  • What is your role in the decision making process?

I have you down for an hourly rate of $300 per hour. Does that rate still work for you?

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben

be_no_prior.body:
Hi Ben,

Thank you for being a part of the Tegus by AlphaSense expert network!

My name is Ben, {{goal}}

I have you down for an hourly rate of $550 per hour. Does that work for you? If so, please book a time on my calendar to discuss the project details: https youcanbook.com/benscheidelman

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben
